type: Tutorial Step - Your Workspace vs Plugins

definition.text: Go to your File Explorer app and look for the following paths relative to the root Superalgos folder...

paragraphs.text: In this folder, you will find a file named Getting Started.json. This is the current workspace; the one you are using at this moment. Everything you have been doing lately has been stored in this file.
In this second folder, you will find several files. Each of them is a plugin workspace shipping with Superalgos. The one named Getting-Started.json is the plugin you started with.
